name: Homeland (2024)
description:
The ancient Darkness has awakened, a black abyss of madness opened up in the mythical and real world.
Simple man standing face to face with metaphysics questions.
Can our hero look in this abyss and save his mind? Can he meet with his own demons?
Our protagonist's girlfriend has been kidnapped by strangers without reason, why they did this?
You need to deal with these creatures!
Metroidvania with horror elements.
A huge world with snow-capped mountains, gloomy forests and ancient cities.
Epic creatures inspired by Slavic fairy tales.
